Name: Abidjan
Description: The economic capital and largest city, located on the Atlantic coast.

Name: Bouake
Description: The second-largest city, located in the central region of the country.

Name: Dabou
Description: A city in the southern part of the country, known for its proximity to the coast.

Name: San Pedro
Description: A port city located on the southwestern coast, important for exports.

Name: Yamoussoukro
Description: The political capital of Cote d Ivoire, located in the central region.

Name: Western Mountains
Description: A region known for its highlands and natural beauty, with lush vegetation.

Name: Southwestern
Description: A region rich in agricultural resources and home to several national parks.

Name: Northern
Description: A vast region known for its savannahs and proximity to Burkina Faso and Mali.

Name: Lagunes
Description: A region known for its lakes, lagoons, and the commercial importance of Abidjan.

Name: Zanzan
Description: A region in the northeastern part of Cote d Ivoire, known for its agriculture and gold mining.
